Method Detail

getBuyers

java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> getBuyers(Group seller)
Returns:
the list of buyers who can create payment obligations to this seller

getIssuers

java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> getIssuers(GuaranteeType guaranteeType)
Returns:
the list of issuers who can issue the specified guarantee type

getRelatedGuaranteeModels

java.util.Collection<GuaranteeType.Model> getRelatedGuaranteeModels(Member member)
                                                                    throws DaoException
Lists guarantee models which has this member as buyer, seller or issuer without take into account any other property.

Throws:
DaoException

getSellers

java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> getSellers(Group issuer)
Lists of sellers for each buyer of the specified issuer

loadFromTransfer

Guarantee loadFromTransfer(Transfer loanTransfer)
Returns:
the guarantee (if any) which loan's transfer is the specified.

search

java.util.List<Guarantee> search(GuaranteeQuery queryParameters)
                                 throws DaoException
Returns a List containing guarantee related to search parameters. If no guarantee type can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

Throws:
DaoException
